thumb.title: cross - FreeToUseMusic
thumb.description: Thank you for listening to my music!!Please subscribe and like!Anyone can use it for free, so please use it for your works!You can use it in any way you like, for games, videos, or anything.色んなジャンルのインストを作曲していますアップされている曲は誰でも無料で使えますので、ぜひ作品に使ってください！↓Please find other musics from here↓https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1ICVPt89tBbtfTQJ6cS0gpVFeJmFX8frj?usp=drive_link↓Please use it after reading the terms of use↓https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1srLMNlmC0c6dEDshK3M2ZcdP7MMUQlGs?usp=sharing【x】 https://x.com/kosame_music_(sorry, this account is Japanese account…But you can contact me in English.
